languages.text: "Ты ошиб{mf|ся|лась} в подсчетах: Скользящая-во-Тьме — самая опасная ксенонаемница в этой части сектора, а мой кормчий... После всех совершенных им зверств язык не повернется назвать его человеком".

"You miscalculate: Slither-in-Darkness is the most dangerous xeno-mercenary in this part of the sector. And my Helmsman… After all the atrocities he has committed, it would be difficult to call him human."
languages.original_text: "Ты ошиб{mf|ся|лась} в подсчетах: Скользящая-во-Тьме — самая опасная ксенонаемница в этой части сектора, а мой кормчий... После всех совершенных им зверств язык не повернется назвать его человеком".

traits.locale_text: "Your reckoning is wrong: Slither-in-Darkness is the most dangerous xeno-mercenary in this part of the sector. And my Helmsman… After all the atrocities he has committed, it would be hard to call him human."

"Your reckoning is wrong: Slither-in-Darkness is the most dangerous xeno-mercenary in this part of the sector. And my Helmsman… After all the atrocities he has committed, it would be hard to call him human."

"You miscalculate: Slither-in-Darkness is the most dangerous xeno-mercenary in this part of the sector. And my Helmsman… After all the atrocities he has committed, it would be difficult to call him human."

"You miscalculate: Slither-in-Darkness is the most dangerous xeno-mercenary in this part of the sector. And my Helmsman… After all the atrocities he has committed, it would be difficult to call him human."

languages.text: 「見誤ったな。スリザー・イン・ダークネスは、この宙域じゃいちばん危険な異種の傭兵だ。それに俺の操舵手…あいつがやってきた酷いことを思えば、人間なんて呼べるかよ」
languages.original_text: "You miscalculate: Slither-in-Darkness is the most dangerous xeno-mercenary in this part of the sector. And my Helmsman… After all the atrocities he has committed, it would be difficult to call him human."

traits.locale_text: 「見誤ったな。スリザー・イン・ダークネスは、この宙域じゃいちばん危険な異種の傭兵だ。それに俺の操舵手…あいつがやってきた酷いことを思えば、人間なんて呼べるかよ」

languages.text: «Ha cometido un error de cálculo: Sombra Furtiva es el xenomercenario más peligroso de esta parte del sector. Además de mi timonel... Después de todas las atrocidades que ha cometido, difícilmente podría considerarse humano».
languages.original_text: "You miscalculate: Slither-in-Darkness is the most dangerous xeno-mercenary in this part of the sector. And my Helmsman… After all the atrocities he has committed, it would be difficult to call him human."

traits.locale_text: «Ha cometido un error de cálculo: Sombra Furtiva es el xenomercenario más peligroso de esta parte del sector. Además de mi timonel... Después de todas las atrocidades que ha cometido, difícilmente podría considerarse humano».

languages.text: “错估形势的人是你。黑暗潜行者是这片星区最危险的异形雇佣兵，至于我的舵手……他犯下了那么多暴行，恐怕已经算不上人了。”
languages.original_text: "You miscalculate: Slither-in-Darkness is the most dangerous xeno-mercenary in this part of the sector. And my Helmsman… After all the atrocities he has committed, it would be difficult to call him human."

traits.locale_text: “错估形势的人是你。黑暗潜行者是这片星区最危险的异形雇佣兵，至于我的舵手……他犯下了那么多暴行，恐怕已经算不上人了。”

languages.text: "Falsch gedacht: Slither-in-Darkness ist der gefährlichste Xeno-Söldner in diesem Teil des Sektors. Und mein Steuermann ... Wobei man ihn nach all den Grausamkeiten, die er begangen hat, schwerlich als menschlich bezeichnen kann."
languages.original_text: "You miscalculate: Slither-in-Darkness is the most dangerous xeno-mercenary in this part of the sector. And my Helmsman… After all the atrocities he has committed, it would be difficult to call him human."

traits.locale_text: "Falsch gedacht: Slither-in-Darkness ist der gefährlichste Xeno-Söldner in diesem Teil des Sektors. Und mein Steuermann ... Wobei man ihn nach all den Grausamkeiten, die er begangen hat, schwerlich als menschlich bezeichnen kann."

languages.text: « Vous vous fourvoyez : le Rôdeur-des-Ténèbres est le xénomercenaire le plus dangereux de cette partie du secteur. Quant à mon maître timonier… Après toutes les atrocités qu'il a commises, j'aurais bien du mal à le qualifier d'humain. »
languages.original_text: "You miscalculate: Slither-in-Darkness is the most dangerous xeno-mercenary in this part of the sector. And my Helmsman… After all the atrocities he has committed, it would be difficult to call him human."

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous fourvoyez : le Rôdeur-des-Ténèbres est le xénomercenaire le plus dangereux de cette partie du secteur. Quant à mon maître timonier… Après toutes les atrocités qu'il a commises, j'aurais bien du mal à le qualifier d'humain. »

languages.text: "Hesaplamaların yanlış: Karanlıkta Süzülen, bu sektördeki en tehlikeli paralı zenodur. Serdümenime... Yaşattığı onca vahşetin ardından ona insan demeye bin şahit gerek."
languages.original_text: "You miscalculate: Slither-in-Darkness is the most dangerous xeno-mercenary in this part of the sector. And my Helmsman… After all the atrocities he has committed, it would be difficult to call him human."

traits.locale_text: "Hesaplamaların yanlış: Karanlıkta Süzülen, bu sektördeki en tehlikeli paralı zenodur. Serdümenime... Yaşattığı onca vahşetin ardından ona insan demeye bin şahit gerek."
